item.title: Demystifying Event Sourcing
item.description: Research - Demystifying Event Sourcing ðŸ”—Preface ðŸ”—There are a lot of articles about event sourcing. Despite of all the opinions on the intenet, this article focuses on fact through a form of research to explore what event sourcing is, where it came from and what can we do with it. Armed with these fact, we should be able to make some logical assumpltions.
